page.title: 17The School Fete.
page.content: We started to get ready for the school fete quite early in the morning we had to take the chairs and tables out of the classrooms and onto the playground, it was overcast and we hoped it would keep fine for the fete so we coulkd raise money for the school fund which would be spent on books, equipment and visits. Parents started to arrive about twelve and they started to set up the various stalls they were going to be responsible for, there were book, plants, cakes and several games which you could play, these included 'Hit the Rat' a game where a sock was dropped down a tube and you had to try and hit it before it hit the ground. Other games included Treasure hunts,picking a square with a number and the right number won a bottle of whiskey.
